시대를 앞선 트렌디한 곡들을 프로듀싱한 TEDDY는 K-Pop의 위상이: TEDDY, who produced trendy songs ahead of their time, not only contributed greatly to K-Pop's rise to global stardom,

전소미는 이국적이고 탄탄한 목소리로 국내와 해외팬들에게 모두 사랑받는 아: Jeon Somi is an artist loved by both domestic and overseas fans with her exotic and strong voice. She is attracting attention in the fashion world for her natural body proportions and consistent self-management, as well as her Barbie doll-like body, photogenic expression, and ability to digest various concepts. '빅뱅'의 메인보컬 및 댄서로 빅뱅의 올라운더로 활약하고 있으며, 200: He is active as an all-rounder in Big Bang as the main vocalist and dancer of Big Bang, and has also been pursuing a solo career since 2008. He is evaluated as one of the best among idols in terms of his singing ability, dancing, and career as a solo musician, and is evaluated as a musician who is evaluated as having musicality, vocals, and dancing skills that go beyond the limits of the idol mold.
바람이 새는 듯 날카롭고 쿨한 특유의 목소리가 일품인 보컬로 잔잔한 R&: He has a unique, sharp and cool voice that seems to be leaking wind, and has a magical voice that goes well with calm R&B or songs with fast beats. He is considered one of the singers whose voice is evaluated as attractive not only in hip-hop but also in the music industry as a whole, but contrary to his cool voice, most of his songs have warm lyrics and beats.
국내 언더그라운드 힙합씬에서 글로벌 시장으로 스펙트럼을 확장할 수 있음을: He is an artist who has shown that he can expand his spectrum from the domestic underground hip-hop scene to the global market. It is characterized by singing-like rap, and is showing fresh and innovative results to the public with visuals and music that transcend genres and styles.
자타가 공인하는 믿고 보는 배우로 잘 알려져 있는 박보검은, 현재까지 맡: Park Bo-gum, who is well known as an actor that everyone can trust and trust, has a variety of roles just by looking at the roles he has played so far (cellist music student, genius baduk player who is clueless about everyday life, etc.) He showed off his wide acting spectrum while playing the characters. Although his basic skills as an actor are good, he is an actor who stands out for continuing to develop new skills, making his acting fun to watch, and making us look forward to seeing what new acting he will show after being discharged from the military.
무한한 가능성을 지닌 배우로써, 2022년 드라마 ‘금수저’로 배우 이종: As an actor with infinite potential, actor Lee Jong-won's name was imprinted on the public through the 2022 drama 'Golden Spoon'. Through this work, which stood out for his sincere acting, he won the 2022 ‘MBC Drama Awards’ Male Rookie Award. Actor Lee Jong-won, who has a cool physique, a colorful atmosphere, and solid acting skills, has the ability to express in detail, and each time he transforms into a new face, he excels in any character he wears, making people look forward to the world of Lee Jong-won's acting.
